Grammar: が (ga)  1: が follows the subject with a verb 2. が follows the subject with an adjective 3. Use が before suki, korai and hoshii 4. Use が before dekiru and wakaru 5. In a noun modifying sentence は is replaced by が  *(General Rule: —- が + Intransitive Verb)
Pattern: 1. Subject + が + Verb 2. Subject + が + Adjective + (desu) 3. が + (suki, kirai, hoshii) + (desu) 4. が + (dekiru, wakaru) 5. Noun modifying clause + が

Grammar: は (wa) 1: は follows the topic of the sentence and is followed but he explanation of the topic 2. が and を are replaced by Wa to mark the negated element of the negative sentence 3. Contrastive sentence
Pattern: 1. Topic + わ 2. —-わ—-ない(negative sentence) 3. X わ —-が, Y わ

Grammar: を (wo) 1: [Direct Object] を + verb(1) 2. [Direct Object] を + verb(2) :を indicates a place of passage 3. [Direct Object] を + verb(3) 4. [Direct Object] を + verb(4) :を indicates place of departure  *(General Rule: —- を + Transitive Verb)
Pattern: 1. —- を + verb (yomu, taberu, yasumu, shiru) 2. [Street/Place] を + verb (aruku, wataru, sanpo suru, hashiru, tobu)  3. [Train/Bus/Car/etc] を orimasu (get off/out of) 4. [Place] を demasu (leave a place)

Grammar: に (ni) 1: に follows the place name :  (に indicates a place of existence) 2. に follows the time, day, month and year : (に indicates a point in time) 3: に follows an indirect object (ex. a person, etc) : (に indicates an “indirect object” which is the recipient of the object which acted by the verb) 4. [Something/Someone] + に + verb 5. [Place] に + go to/come/return to :  に indicates direction of movement 6. [Place] に + enter 7. [Time Period] に + kai/do [Number of times] 8. [Noun/Verb] に + go to/come/return to : に indicates a purpose
Pattern: 1.[Place] に imasu/arimasu 2.[Time] に —-shimasu 3.[Indirect Object] に —- + verb (ask, telephone, teach, etc)  4.[Person] に aimasu (meet) [Place] に sunde imasu (live) [Bus/Train/Car] に norimasu (get on/in) [Company] に tsutomete imasu (work for) [Note/Paper] に kakimasu (write on) [Chair] に suwaru (sit on) 5.[Place] に + verb (iku, kuru, kaeru) 6.[Place] に + verb (hairu) 7.[Time Period] に + かい/ど [Number of times] 8.[Noun] に + verb (iku, kuru, kaeru) [Verb - masu] に + verb (iku, kuru, kaeru)
